document_data.name: Clover
document_data.mainbody:
Fist '''Clover''' was a member of the [[Flaming Fist]] mercenary company from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|''Hey, good-looking. Behave yourself, yeah? I'd hate to see someone as pretty as you in cuffs.''|Fist Clover}}
document_data.Description: Clover had a fair complexion with mousy-gray hair gathered in a ponytail wrapped around her head. She wore a set of [[leather armor]] as partof her Flaming Fist uniform and was armed with a deadly [[heavy crossbow]]. Clover had a flirtatious personality.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Fist Clover was stationed in the [[Basilisk Gate]]'s barracks and prison, serving under Blaze [[Liara Portyr]] and [[Manip Seyama]]. She spent her time patrolling the barracks grounds during the [[Absolutist]] crisis.
